name: Escape Planet X Online
description:
This is the online version of Escape planet X. To download to your computer and play offline, visit https://howardl.itch.io/escapex

During your mission to Mars, you get in trouble because your Spaceship stopped working. You crashed on planet X, and luckily, you found another spaceship on this planet. Your mission is find that spaceship and escape the planet as soon as possible. An asteroid is coming, so you have to hurry up. Good luck!
